response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product, valued at $15,000 to you, is an exceptional investment that promises to deliver significant returns on your expectations. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a premium product at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
